00024 void CompoundRenderable::registerUser(SceneNode* node)
00025 {
00026     if (!isUser(node))
00027         users.push_back(node);
00028 
00029     list<Renderable*>::iterator iter;
00030     if (renderables.size() > 0)
00031     {
00032         for (iter = renderables.begin(); iter != renderables.end(); ++iter)
00033             (*iter)->registerUser(node);
00034     }
00035 }

00037 void CompoundRenderable::removeAllUsers()
00038 {
00039     std::list<SceneNode*>::const_iterator iter;
00040     for (iter = users.begin(); iter != users.end(); ++iter)
00041     {
00042         (*iter)->removeComponent();
00043         list<Renderable*>::const_iterator iter2;
00044         for (iter2 = renderables.begin(); iter2 != renderables.end(); ++iter2)
00045             (*iter2)->notifyRemoved((*iter));
00046     }
00047 
00048     users.clear();
00049 }

00051 void CompoundRenderable::notifyRemoved(SceneNode* node)
00052 {
00053     users.remove(node);
00054 
00055     list<Renderable*>::const_iterator iter;
00056     for (iter = renderables.begin(); iter != renderables.end(); ++iter)
00057         (*iter)->notifyRemoved(node);
00058 }

00060 void CompoundRenderable::addRenderable(Renderable* render)
00061 {
00062     list<Renderable*>::const_iterator iter;
00063     for (iter = renderables.begin(); iter != renderables.end(); ++iter)
00064     {
00065         if ((*iter) == render)
00066             return;
00067     }
00068     renderables.push_back(render);
00069 
00070     list<SceneNode*>::const_iterator iter2;
00071     for (iter2 = users.begin(); iter2 != users.end(); ++iter2)
00072         render->registerUser((*iter2));
00073 }
00074 
00075 Renderable* CompoundRenderable::removeRenderable(const string& name)
00076 {
00077     list<Renderable*>::const_iterator iter;
00078     for (iter = renderables.begin(); iter != renderables.end(); ++iter)
00079     {
00080         if ((*iter)->getName() == name)
00081         {
00082             list<SceneNode*>::const_iterator iter2;
00083             for (iter2 = users.begin(); iter2 != users.end(); ++iter2)
00084                 (*iter)->notifyRemoved((*iter2));
00085             Renderable* toReturn = (*iter);
00086             renderables.remove((*iter));
00087             return toReturn;
00088         }
00089     }
00090     Utils::get()->writeToLog("Renderable named: " + name + " does not exist in the CompoundRenderable " + this->name);
00091     return NULL;
00092 }
